title: Fallback
description: If no previous parser stage was able to handle the stream, the fallback parser will copy the data into the _raw_content_ field for later parsing and analysis.

label.title: Label
label.description: A label for this Parser Stage

mediaTypes.title: Media Types for this Parser Stage

pathPatterns.title: File names to parse
pathPatterns.description: Specify a file name or pattern that must be matched for this parser stage to run. Forward slashes ("/") are used to join names of files inside archives with the archive name.

syntax.title: Pattern type
syntax.description: glob uses bash shell-style wildcards; regex uses Java (PCRE-style) regex

pattern.title: File name or pattern
pattern.description: e.g.: "z.txt" or "*.md" or "/a/*/b/f.txt" for glob; "z.txt$" or ".*\.txt$" or "^/a/[^\/]*/b/f.txt$" for regex

inheritMediaTypes.title: use default media types for this Parser Stage
inheritMediaTypes.description: Indicates if parser stage should use the default media types.  Unchecking this box means that ONLY the manually configured media types will be parsed by the parser and you then MUST provide at least one media type.

outputFieldPrefix.title: Prefix parsed fields with
outputFieldPrefix.description: Fields extracted by this parser will be prefixed with this string. The remainder of the field name will be as detected in the stream
